title: I wish more people liked Kara no Kyoukai

embed.description: Clip from the Type-Moon anime adaptation Kara no Kyoukai: Overlooking View animated by Ufotable and soundtrack by Yuki Kajiura. I do not own Kara no Kyoukai or anything in this video, I am just showing a clip.

body: It is legit fantastic. I can respect anyone who can stab all of their problems away. Literally all of their problems.
